moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Poison Gas
moves.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. It may poison those hit.

moves.name: Poison Gas
moves.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. It may poison those hit.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Smokescreen
moves.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Feint
moves.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

moves.name: Acid Spray
moves.description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Memento
moves.description: The user faints when using this move. In return, it harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Belch
moves.description: The user lets out a damaging belch on the target. The user must eat a Berry to use this move.

moves.name: Explosion
moves.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.
